greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence is limit_{t->oo} s_t, where s_k = s_{k-1},s_{k-1}[k-1..end] starting with s_0 = s_0[0..1] = 0,1.
maple: s(10);  # gives 1035 = A005126(10) terms;  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 12 2020
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n<2, n, Module[{k = Floor@Log[2, n], m = n}, m-=k+1; While[k >= 0, If[BitGet[m, k]==0, m++; If[BitGet[m, k]==1, Return[1]]]; k--]]; 0];
a /@ Range[0, 104] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 16 2020, after _Kevin Ryde_ *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = { if(n, my(k=logint(n,2)); n-=k+1; while(k>=0, if(!bittest(n,k), n++; if(bittest(n,k), return(1))); k--)); 0; }  \\ _Kevin Ryde_, Jun 26 2020
results.author: _Richard Aime Blavy_, May 12 2020
